text: “Ndipo akunena (akafiri a m’ Makka, kuuza Mtumiki): “Ngati titsatira chiongoko (ichi chimene wadza nacho) pamodzi ndi iwe, tifwambidwa m’dziko lathu (potimenya nkhondo mafuko ena a Arabu).” Kodi sitidawakhazike pamalo opatulika ndi pa mtendere pomwe zipatso za mitundumitundu zikudza pamenepo mwaulere (monga rizq) zochokera kwa Ife? Koma ambiri a iwo sadziwa
